name: San Francisco Human Rights Commission
description: The San Francisco Human Rights Commission helps people who have been or are treated unfairly. They offer services in many languages and support those facing discrimination due to race, ethnicity, sex, disability, sexual orientation, AIDS/HIV status, families with children, source of income, etc.
